
java thread 중에 cpu 과점유 쓰레드를 확인하는 방법이다.

ps -mo pid,lwp,pcpu,start_time,time -p <java_PID>

[root]# ps -mo pid,lwp,pcpu,start_time,time -p 28391
  PID   LWP %CPU START     TIME
28391     -  1.5 15:31 00:00:18
    - 28391  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28437  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28438  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28439  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28440  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28441  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28442  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28443  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28444  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28445  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28446  0.3 15:31 00:00:04
    - 28447  0.4 15:31 00:00:05
    - 28448  0.1 15:31 00:00:01
    - 28449  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28450  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28451  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28452  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28453  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28454  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28457  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28458  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28459  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28460  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28461  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28462  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28463  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28464  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28465  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28466  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28467  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28468  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28469  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28470  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28471  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28472  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28473  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28474  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28475  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28476  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28477  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28478  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28479  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28480  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28481  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28482  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28483  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28484  0.0 15:31 00:00:00
    - 28485  0.0 15:31 00:00:00

[root]# kill -3 28391
 
thread dump 는 docker logs -f <container_ID> 를 통해 얻어온다.
